fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, Harass a player, sending them a link to your server. If they don't join your server, you attack them.
- If a player leaves your server of their own volition while they are still alive, you attack them. (They can't be banned or kicked to achieve this effect.)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of the game, choose a link to a discord server that lasts indefinitely. When this role refers to "your server", that link is used. (You don't actually have to choose your server.)
- If the host is thinking about rerolling this role, instead this role acts as a default ToS2 serial killer (but with this post's name and number)

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value:
Kill everyone or get 4 people to join your discord server
